sense.def: Illness Sign of topical swelling accompanied by difficulties moving. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 舌腫脈脹 急，則舌腫強 , “When the tongue is swollen und the vessels are distended and tight, then this is tongue swelling and stiffness ”. Zhong jiao re 中焦熱 , heat in the central burner [1]

Pathological Condition of heat-type diseases affecting the central burner. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 20 Recipe Entry lan qing wan 藍青丸 , pills with indigo blue: 治中焦熱，下痢水穀 , “They cure heat in the central burner , and discharge of liquid and solid food with free-flux illness”.
